body.content:
Dear Oswald

Appreciation for your kind response to my previous mail to you. I am not
here to tell you stories of anything that is not real or legitimate in this
communication. I am about to begin with you. First , let me introduce
myself, I am Mrs. Amal Tantawy, Vice Chairman For Financial Affairs for the
Egyptian Natural Gas Holding Company (EGAS).

*Why We contacted you;*

The reason for this communication with you is to inform you on a huge sum
of funds that as be deposited in an offshore bank  abroad and we need a
honest and trusted person to work with to receive and secure this funds on
our behalf till we are able to come for proper sharing of the funds in your
custody/possession.

*Our Questions to you;*

(i) Are you willing to work with us?

(ii) Can you handle funds in Millions (USD/GBP)?
(iii) Are you willing to follow simple instructions and directives?
(vi) Are you willing and ready to handle this transaction with utmost
secrecy and transparency?
(v) Have you been involved in any kind of criminal activities in your
country or abroad?

The funds we are talking about are not from any illegal activities. The
funds are for sales of  (1) LNG Plants and (2) LNG and other GAS products
in the past years that have been written off as BAD DEBT to our company.
The top members of the company were able to recover the funds and deposited
it offshore for years now and also we have been able to secure documents
and paperwork for the funds that can never be traced by the firm. We have
also put in place legal personnel that will handle all paperwork for this
transaction and the release of the funds to you once we can prove and trust
your person to these funds. We have a lot of individuals that are on our
list but we have not found them trustworthy of this communication. If you
are interested, then kindly let us know by giving us some information about
yourself.

You will need to respond to the above questions before we can begin with
more detailed information regarding the funds and how we can work things
out to secure the funds successfully. Hope it is well understood.

Hope to hear from you soon. Have a blessed day.
Regards
Mrs. Amal Tantawy
Vice Chairman

MEMBERS,

BOARD OF DIRECTORS

(EGAS / GASCO)

*EMAIL: *amal0450517tantawy@gmail.com
                 mrs.amaltantawy@aol.com
*Tel: +2 25384508 / +2 25384509*


On Wed, Sep 15, 2021 at 8:40 PM <oswald@asdfghjkl.ovh> wrote:

> Hello,
> how can I help you with this?
>
> Sincerely
> Oswald
>
>
